import React, { Component } from 'react'; import "./checkbox.css" import authService from '../../services/auth.service'; class Checkedd extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.markcheckbox = this.markcheckbox.bind(this); this.state = { } } /** * * @param {*} e * @param {*} day * check the box send to backend. */ async markcheckbox(day) { if(this.props.homework){ let myhomework= this.props.homework let ob = this.props.homework.hwchecked ob[day]=!ob[day] myhomework.hwchecked=ob this.props.dispatch({[this.props.state.currentstudent.homeworks[this.props.homework._id?this.props.homework._id: this.props.homework.id].hwchecked]:ob}) authService.changeData("student", this.props.state.currentstudent._id, this.props.state.currentuser._id, {homework: myhomework}) } else{ let ob = this.props.student.syncedCheckboxes ob[day]=!ob[day] this.props.dispatch({[this.props.state.currentuser.students[this.props.student.__v].syncedCheckboxes]:ob}) authService.changeData("student", this.props.student._id, this.props.state.currentuser._id, {syncedCheckboxes: ob}) } } render() { return (
) } } export default Checkedd;
